properties.description: This utility pipeline can be used for loading multiple Shared Branch Interchange files in sequence.
Shared Branch Interchange Data moving from Raw (ADLS) to stage table and to the SB final table.
Opting to set NO start or end date parameters will default to run UTCNow()-1

This pipeline run transactions from Drop To Raw And Conformed.
Calling the dropToRaw and Mastertransactions pipelines

activities.name: truncate_rewards_member_response_raw_daily
activities.description: truncates two staging tables -raw and daily staging tables
